DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective study : A . Evaluate diagnostic value determination copeptin test pre-hospital care another diagnosis ; B. Assess prognostic value copeptin assay vital prognosis day 28 ; C. Evaluate kinetics copeptin troponin HS initial ambulance care arrival emergency department ; D. Evaluate potential impact copeptin test pre-hospital patient care ; E. Assess economic impact pre-hospital copeptin test term hospital stay optimize ambulance movement .
DOC.criteria: major adult patient take charge emergency ambulance service participate center nontraumatic chest pain suspect ACS electrocardiogram initially exclude ST segment elevation The patient participate another study The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient ( legal representative ) formalize his/her opposition study It impossible correctly inform patient The patient pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The patient contraindication treatment use study The patient 's initial electrocardiogram indicate ST segment elevation
